body_html: Please, do not close this issue until its fixed. Either the compilation with CUDA 8.0 should be corrected or the official doc here https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#optional_install_tensorflow_for_gpu_prerequisites should be fixed, now it states CUDA >= 7.0 is required. With current state lot of people waste their time trying to compile with CUDA 8.0 and looking for solution...

body: Please, do not close this issue until its fixed. Either the compilation with CUDA 8.0 should be corrected or the official doc here https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources#optional_install_tensorflow_for_gpu_prerequisites should be fixed, now it states CUDA >= 7.0 is required. With current state lot of people waste their time trying to compile with CUDA 8.0 and looking for solution...
